# F2_random_number_generator

Code for *Bunny* :

Based on https://perso.isima.fr/~dahill/Simu-ZZ2/Lab%20%23%201%20-%20Modeling%20and%20simulating%20randomess.pdf

Compilation : 

(Don't forget to create an `bin` directory in the same folder as `src`)

`gcc -O1 -g ./src/betterC/*.c* ./src/prog/*.c* -o ./bin/test.exe -Wall -Wextra -Wcomment -Wno-unknown-pragmas`

Run :

`./bin/test.exe`

(The compilation command for Visual Code is also configured, just change the compiler/debugger path if needed)

Ouput : (Sorry, no colored output in markdown, execute the code in a terminal that support ANSI colors)

